subtitle: A main meal salad. Serve with fresh granary bread.

method.text: Gently toss salad leaves in a large serving bowl. Stir in the prepared celery, apples, dates, walnuts and cheeses.

Grate the rind from the orange before peeling. Reserve for the dressing. Peel and segment the orange with a sharp stainless steel knife, working over a bowl to catch the juices. Add the orange segments to the salad.
Place the orange juice and rind and dressing ingredients in a screw-top jar. Shake well until combined. Pour over the slad. Toss and serve.

title: Cheese and date salad
